last_episode_to_air.name: Return
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sora sacrifices himself to distract Morganna, allowing Tsukasa, Subaru, Mimiru and the awakened Aura to escape. Tsukasa, now confirmed to be a girl, logs out from the game and wakes up from the coma. She meets Subaru's player in a wheelchair.

name: .hack//SIGN
overview: A strange boy named Tsukasa appears in the online video game "The World". He claims to be alive, and without a computer.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A strange boy named Tsukasa appears in the online video game "The World". He claims to be alive, and without a computer.
